Class WorkoutService

java.lang.Object
com.example.oopproject.services.WorkoutService
@Service public class WorkoutService extends Object
Service class for managing Workout entities. Provides methods to create, read, update, delete, paginate, filter by date, and search workouts.

  • Method Details

    • createWorkout

      public Workout createWorkout(Workout workout)
      Creates and saves a new Workout.
      Parameters:
      workout - the Workout entity to create
      Returns:
      the saved Workout entity

    • getAllWorkouts

      public List<Workout> getAllWorkouts()
      Retrieves all workouts.
      Returns:
      list of all Workout entities

    • getWorkoutById

      public Workout getWorkoutById(String id)
      Finds a workout by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the workout ID
      Returns:
      the Workout entity if found, otherwise null

    • updateWorkout

      public Workout updateWorkout(String id, Workout updatedWorkout)
      Updates an existing workout by ID. If workout exists, updates its fields and saves it.
      Parameters:
      id - the workout ID to update
      updatedWorkout - Workout object with updated data
      Returns:
      the updated Workout entity, or null if not found

    • deleteWorkout

      public void deleteWorkout(String id)
      Deletes a workout by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the workout ID to delete

    • getPaginatedWorkouts

      public List<Workout> getPaginatedWorkouts(int page, int size, String sortBy, String sortDir)
      Retrieves a paginated and sorted list of workouts.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (0-based)
      size - number of items per page
      sortBy - field to sort by
      sortDir - direction of sorting ("asc" or "desc")
      Returns:
      list of workouts for the requested page and sort order

    • filterByDateRange

      public List<Workout> filterByDateRange(String startDateStr, String endDateStr) throws ParseException
      Filters workouts by a date range.
      Parameters:
      startDateStr - start date in "yyyy-MM-dd" format
      endDateStr - end date in "yyyy-MM-dd" format
      Returns:
      list of workouts whose date is between startDate and endDate
      Throws:
      ParseException - if date parsing fails

    • searchWorkouts

      public List<Workout> searchWorkouts(String workoutType, String userId)
      Searches workouts by workout type and optionally filters by user ID.
      Parameters:
      workoutType - the workout type to search for
      userId - optional user ID to filter workouts by user
      Returns:
      list of workouts matching the criteria
